category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEActivityTypeColors
preference.preference_description: Specifies the colors associated with the types of activities, as defined in the time_system_category property of the MEActivity class. A color is represented by a string composed of the red, green, and blue values of the color, separated by a decimal point. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as a value. Each string must have the following format: type;color type is a value of the time_system_category property and color is the red, green, and blue values of the corresponding color, separated by decimal point.
